(A44 → (A1 → G)).natural: In case formulation maintains stability, then whenever drug development requires FDA approval, company is profitable in business.

(A51 → A50).natural: Provided drug optimizes dosage, drug develops formulation.

(A52 → A51).natural: If drug scales production, then drug optimizes dosage.

(A55 → A56).natural: In case intellectual property protects by patent, patent files application.

(A58 → A57).natural: If patent registers at office, then patent grants protection.

(A60 → ¬A59).natural: Whenever patent challenges validity, generic is not approved by FDA.

(A62 → A63).natural: Provided patent violates law, company faces lawsuit.

(A62 → A64).natural: If patent violates law, then dispute settles in court.

(A62 ∨ (A61 → ¬A59)).natural: Either patent violates law, or if patent licenses to generic, generic is not approved by FDA.

(A64 → A63).natural: Whenever dispute settles in court, company faces lawsuit.

(A65 → A66).natural: Under the condition that company pays damages, company loses case.

(A67 → A68).natural: If facility operates under GMP, then facility passes inspection.
